name: BatuGame
description:
Classic retro MMO ARPG game, kill all kinds of monsters to get equipment, make yourself stronger, to meet the more difficult challenges. You can also participate in the siege battles to become the city lord and get the top honor!

◆Game Features◆
All items can be obtained by killing monsters, so if you can liver, you can have it all!

◆Game System◆
fashion system
Pet system
S.H.I.E.L.D. system
Cutting system
Equipment Synthesis
reincarnation
Battle Flag Build
Tomahawk building
nomenclature system

◆mass of dungeons◆
Titular dungeon
Tower of the Nine Storeys of Evil
The Secret of the Nine Devils.
Infinite Mysteries
Temple of the King
Second World
Challenge the Great Sage
World Boss
The twelve realms of heaven and earth
